author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44252

#### PR description:

This PR contains a number of miscellaneous fixes / improvements in order to be able to run the `Zmumu` and `DiMuonVertex` tools in the tracker alignment all-in-one meta-tool, collecting feedback from users:
   * [minimal fixes to make Zmumumerge run in unit tests](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/df0dced5b39991e43a0f1ce057bb0f0ba60601ac)
   * [add unit tests for Zmumu validation](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/190724f9b84b1425a05b81cdb51bbd132670d1e1)
   * [fix DiMuonV_cfg.py so that it can be used with ALCARECO data-tier](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/859a2f4a0a1cd49e337381fb2c4a362ac9fd27c6)
   * [fixes to the DiMuonVertexValidation to work when files are on eos](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/1004def13a0b776a7e36813d7618aa5ca7809810)
   * [Graphical improvements to Zmumumerge](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/6bf8db579854c33b91764061ea8ead475760a4d9) (co-authored by @bcamaian)
   * [modify loopAndPlot.C to show inverse cosphi plots](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/a60e69ee05fbcf16d6c267874a499171aee34e7c) (co-authored by @phnattla)
   * [miscellaneous fixes to DiMuonVertexValidation source and configuration](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/54465355aeb128054103906c0cf030e8be5f80e2)

#### PR validation:

Run successfully the augmented unit tests via:
   * `scram b runtests_Zmumuall`
   * `scram b runtests_DiMuonVall`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

verbatim backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44252 for 2024 data operations.
title: [14.0.X]  Tracker alignment offline validation tools: miscellaneous fixes to muon-related validations
